item.title: ★ Universi ★ | Eco | 100% Uptime | Curses | GE | All Skills | Overloads | Miniga
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

.exe simply said i doesn’t have the rights to open/start it, while i’m the only administrator.
I chose the .exe file as you located it at 'Windows users’
The .jar worked fine which is for both systems.

Few other things.

[ul][li]rune arrows amount doesn’t go down the correct way, only one like every 10 shots might be like this for more ammo[/li]
[li]rune arrows don’t appear on the ground when shot[/li]
[li]zombie mini-game, non exsisting?[/li]
[li]i can’t search for any item i wish to buy on the exchange, only the items currently being offered[/li][/ul]

Read full topic

item.title: ★ Universi ★ | Eco | 100% Uptime | Curses | GE | All Skills | Overloads | Miniga
item.dc:creator: @yungtree yungtree
item.description:
@yungtree wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:2, topic:554135”][ul]Criticism etc.

[list]
[li].exe client didn’t work for me[/li]
[li]over-used turotial, make something new or make some changes to it[/li]
[li]Character look doesn’t save before the tutorial start, you end looking as the standard character[/li]
[/list][/ul][/quote]

1.) Can you try and get the error for me? If you don’t know how, you can get it by running the .exe in Command Prompt
2.) I will change the tutorial now.
3.) I’ll work on that.

Read full topic
